title: Special on Studio Apartment Near the Beach
posting_body: ['For a limited time, we have lowered the rent on our studio apartments from $1,500 to $1400.', 'This is good for the entire term of the lease.', 'In addition, we will waive the administration fee and charge only $1,000 for your deposit.', 'Palms on 23rd is a professionally managed community with a maintenance and management team that is proactive in caring for the property and your home.', ' We are located in a fabulous area less than a mile from the beach.', 'You will find shopping, restaurants, parks and so much more nearby.', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'for more information or to secure your new home.', 'Some of the advantages of living at Palms on 23rd include:', 'Professional Management', 'Skilled Maintenence', 'Pet Friendly (with restrictions)', 'Located on quiet street but near the heart of town', 'Laundry on-site', 'Close to the beach', 'Near bus route', 'Convinient location near Atlantic and Federal', 'Location: 23 NE 23rd Avenue in Pompano Beach.', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Website: <URL>', 'Please note: Inside photos are representative and may not be of the unit advertised.']
